title: Renaming a model does not rename the fullscoped names of its childs

content.raw: As the title says. When we rename a model using a world or model plugin, the scope names of its childs remains the same. This is critical, when we want to spawn severeal instances of one model type and access their childs later. Thus, the scope names of e.g. attached sensors are not unique.
content.html: As the title says. When we rename a model using a world or model plugin, the scope names of its childs remains the same. This is critical, when we want to spawn severeal instances of one model type and access their childs later. Thus, the scope names of e.g. attached sensors are not unique.
